Name: Ralgar, the Inferno King
Story Background: Born from the heart of a volcano, Ralgar wields the power of fire and magma.
Ability: When Ralgar enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to any target. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Ralgar gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Appearance Description: Ralgar is a towering figure made of molten lava and burning embers, with flames dancing around his form and leaving a trail of smoke in his wake
